findings.title: RFVD - Redundant Fee Variable Declarations
findings.description: The contract utilizes multiple variables to apply tax on buy and sell transactions, but these variables do not contribute to the calculation of distinct values. Instead, they are simply added together to calculate the `totalTax` value.

findings.title: MCM - Misleading Comment Messages
findings.description: The contract uses misleading comment messages that do not accurately reflect the actual implementation, making it difficult to understand the source code.

findings.title: IDI - Immutable Declaration Improvement
findings.description: The contract declares state variables that their value is initialized once in the constructor and are not modified afterwards.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: The code does not adhere to the Solidity style guide, which can lead to decreased readability and maintainability.
